sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          v-model="selectedMember1"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="name"
          multiple
        >
          <template v-slot:selection="data">
            <v-chip
              v-bind="data.attrs"
              :input-value="data.selected"
              close
              @click="data.select"
              @click:close="remove(data.item)"
            >
              {{ data.item.name }}
            </v-chip>
          </template>
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex'

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  data: () => ({
    selectedItem: null,
  }),
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('users', ['users']),
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchUsers();
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('users', ['fetchUsers']),
  },
};
</script>
